IAsset - Interface in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
Base interface for all the assets you can download.

Provides access to Cursors over the Asset data.

An interface used to pass asset parameters across the process boundary during asset creation.

Encapsulates the backplane Download Permission Response for an asset.

Interface for retrieving information on number of Asset downloads on a particular device of the account.

Interface for retrieving information on number of downloads on a particular device of the account.
IAssetPermission.PermissionCode - Class in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
Provides permission codes for determining if the download is permitted or not.
IAssetProvider - Interface in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
Provides access to Asset data through a Cursor.

Interface which should be implemented to provide registration of background processing functions to the SDK.

IDrmInitData.Universal - Class in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm

The interface to Events which are generated by the SDK for the purpose of analytics.

IForegroundNotificationProvider - Interface in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
This interface defines the methods which must be provided if the client application wishes to generate update notifications from within the service process.
IIdentifier - Interface in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
The interface to identify assets in Virtuoso
This base interface reduces the need for passing substantial amounts of data across process boundaries and can be used to uniquely identify an asset and its parent.
